backend/main.mo: Backend actor implementing access control, user profiles, rank definitions, and player stats with query and update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files used for reference.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment checklist detailing verification steps for matchmaking, UI flows, error handling, and rollback procedures.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables and themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and global providers.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer component showing copyright, branding, and caffeine.ai referral link.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Navigation header with logo, route buttons, profile display, and login button.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper combining header, main content slot, and footer.
frontend/src/components/BuyGoonFighterBu: Purchase button that creates a Stripe checkout session and redirects the user to payment.
frontend/src/components/CombatOutcomeCar: Displays combat results with winner/loser info, health, rounds, and victory/defeat styling. Shows bonus points alert when the player wins.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading state and error handling. Clears queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Shows a dialog prompting new authenticated users to set a display name. Saves the profile and handles validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/RankBadge.tsx: Renders a styled badge showing a player's rank and point total. Supports multiple size options.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupDialo: Modal for entering Stripe secret key and allowed countries, saving configuration via mutation. Includes validation and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes. Initializes access control with an optional admin token.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state, stored identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, ranks, stats, leaderboard, matchmaking, match results, and combat actions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, including colors and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page showing hero section and cards linking to multiplayer and story mode.
frontend/src/pages/Leaderboard.tsx: Displays global leaderboard, fetching player stats and ranks with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/Multiplayer.tsx: Handles matchmaking, combat resolution, and UI for online multiplayer battles.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Shows payment cancellation message with navigation options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Processes Stripe session status, unlocks story mode access, and displays success or error states.
frontend/src/pages/StoryMode.tsx: Manages story mode progression, access checks, Stripe config handling, and encounter combat resolution.
frontend/src/types/combat.ts: Defines the CombatResult interface for combat outcomes.
frontend/src/utils/combatErrors.ts: Normalizes combat-related errors into user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash-based), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and clear them for persistence and cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme settings, custom colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature list, known issues, and architectural notes for the Goon Life game state.
